name: Family Mansion
description:
This game supports controllers. Your progress is automatically saved.

Z to roll
X to shoot
Hold still when hurt to use a healing spell (after you've gotten them from the butler)

A game by Toby Alden (www.tobyalden.com)

Art:
John Bond (www.kaimatten.com)
Sam Alden
